name: The Robin Snyder Cut (beta version)
description:
This game will always be free to play. Currently it is in Beta.

We are asking for donations to help pay for music and some additional vocals and scenes. If we can meet our goals, we plan to add extra stages and an additional boss fight (giant Sedusa).

Leave a comment if you donate and would like a name added to the credit screen for the finished game.

Also, leave a comment if you found errors or have suggestions to improve the game. Thank you! ^^

  • Left D-Pad  /  Left arrow moves left
  • Right D-Pad  /   Right arrow moves right
  • A button  /  Up arrow is jump
  • Down D-Pad  /  Down arrow to pick up item
  • X Button  /  D key for punch
  • X Button and Up D-Pad  /   W key for uppercut
  • X Button and Down D-Pad  /  S key for kick
  • B Button   /  A key is for weapon
  • Right trigger to switch weapons
  • 1 to switch to Blossom weapon
  • 2 to switch to Buttercup weapon
  • 3 to switch to Bubbles weapon
